frontMatter.title: ScyllaDB’s Compaction Series: Size-Tiered Compaction
frontMatter.summary: This is the first post in a series of four about the different compaction strategies available in ScyllaDB. This first post will focus on ScyllaDB’s default compaction strategy, size-tiered compaction strategy.

next.title: Mozilla Hacks’ 10 most-read posts of 2019
next.summary: Mozilla Hacks covered plenty of interesting territory in 2019. Our most popular posts introduced experiments and special projects, and described the evolution of groundbreaking platform technologies like WebAssembly and WASI. ...
